mapper.insert: insert into review(rno, pno, id, content, score) values(review_seq.nextval, #{pno}, #{id}, #{content}, #{score})
mapper.select: select count(*) from c_reviewList where id =#{id} and no = #{no}
SELECT distinct COALESCE( ( SELECT enrollList.pno FROM enrollList WHERE enrollList.id = #{id} AND enrollList.no = #{no} AND enrollList.status = '결제완료' ), 0 ) AS pno from enrollList
mapper.delete: delete from review where pno=#{pno} and id=#{id}
